name: Nicktoons MLB
description:
A dugout full of Nicktoons including SpongeBob, ZIM, Dudley Puppy,
Fanboy, Chum Chum, Aang and more team up with superstars from all 30 MLB
clubs in this epic baseball Showdown! You will swing for the fences in
out-of-this-world Nicktoons venues and realistic MLB ballparks and
collect over 50 in-game baseball cards complete with character bios.

Features

•Commentary by Perch Perkins and the unpredictable robot GIR.
•25
Top Nicktoons and 150 MLB Players!
•Quick Play, Full Season,
Tournament and Distance Derby modes.
